fcs.nameLong: Multi-layer Federated Content Search Query Language (FCS-QL)

balloon.label: Query Suggestions
balloon.description: Show search query suggestions in a dialog

braces.label: Wrap in braces
braces.description: Wrap expression / query in braces, e.g., for nesting

envelope-arrow-up.label: Send to Weblicht
envelope-arrow-up.description: Send result texts to Weblicht for further processing

eye.label: Result Details
eye.description: Show result details in own dialog

eye-fill.label: Inspect
eye-fill.description: Inspect endpoint with FCS Endpoint Validator or show resource information

house-door.label: Homepage / More information
house-door.description: Link with more information, e.g., to homepage

link-45deg.label: External link
link-45deg.description: External link to resource details or result

magic.label: Visual Query Builder
magic.description: Open Visual Query Builder for create a new search query in a dialog

plus-circle.label: Add
plus-circle.description: Add a new query fragment, expression, etc.

repeat.label: Add Quantifier
repeat.description: Add a quantifier for a query fragment

shield-check.label: Available Access-restricted Resource
shield-check.description: Resource has availability restriction and should be available due to authenticated user.

shield-lock.label: Access-restricted Resource
shield-lock.description: Resource has availability restriction and requires user authentication.

x-circle.label: Remove
x-circle.description: Remove a part of a query

file-earmark-code.label: Developer Information
file-earmark-code.description: Show information primarily for FCS developers
